{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Cisco Valet M10 v1.0.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wireless-N Broadband Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = http://support.linksys.com/us/support-product?pid=01t80000003K7idAAC |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |fandom = Cisco_Valet_M10_v2.0 |wikidevi = Cisco_Valet_M10_v2 |wikipedia = [[wikipedia:Cisco valet routers|Cisco valet routers]] |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Cisco |model = M10 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/02/2010 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/Cisco_Valet_M10_v2.0 |wlclass = N300 |series = Valet |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Q87-M10V2, Q87-E1000V2 |icid = 3839A-M10V2 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 3763-11200502R |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM5357B0; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74K |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 300 <!-- 300 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = Serial |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L3206E; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9425G6JH-5; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = yes
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = CyberTAN |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = FreshTomato
|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/18/2010 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B003B4AVRE |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = 7.95" x 6.30" x 1.34" |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = Internal |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "3763-11200502R" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The hardware appears to be the same as the [[Linksys E1000 v2.0]].
{{See also|Cisco Valet M10 v1}}
==Links of Interest== *[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cisco_Valet_Routers ''Cisco valet routers'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[http://www.linksysinfo.org/index.php?threads/adding-linksys-e-series-support.37444/ Adding Linksys E-series Support] On the '''Tomato''' Forum
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing Tomato=== <font color=red><big>'''NOTES:'''</big></font> '''To flash from stock firmware, follow the link [http://www.linksysinfo.org/index.php?threads/adding-linksys-e-series-support.37444/ HERE].Â After flashing and doing a 30/30/30, you will then be able to flash a more current build of [https://freshtomato.org/ FreshTomato]
Please insert instructions here
